Title: The No. 1 Ladies' Detective Agency
Writer: Richard Curtis (teleplay), Anthony Minghella (teleplay), Alexander McCall Smith (novel)
Actors: Jill Scott, Anika Noni Rose, Lucian Msamati, Nikki Amuka-Bird
Plot: A Botswanan woman starts up the country's first female-owned detective agency. Based on the series of novels by Alexander McCall Smith.
